thread.title: Father suspected of gunning down his two daughters in ‘honour killing’ filmed them in bed and told them they had ‘nice legs’
thread.title_full: Father suspected of gunning down his two daughters in ‘honour killing’ filmed them in bed and told them they had ‘nice legs’

author: swebb
title: Father suspected of gunning down his two daughters in ‘honour killing’ filmed them in bed and told them they had ‘nice legs’
text:
Opinion DISTURBING FOOTAGE Father suspected of gunning down his two daughters in ‘honour killing’ filmed them in bed and told them they had ‘nice legs’ 
The dad filmed the sleeping girls and is heard to say: "Nice legs. Mmm very nice" Revealed BY SAM WEBB 4th February 2017, 1:38 am A FATHER who is wanted for the murder of his two daughters in 2008 filmed the teenagers in bed and creepily complimented their legs in horrifying new footage. 
Yaser Abdel Said disappeared after Amina, 18, and Sarah, 17, were shot 11 times in a taxi on New Year’s Day. Facebook/The Price Of Honour It is believed Said gunned down his two daughters Amina, 18, and Sarah, 17, and then fled Facebook/The Price Of Honour Said was described as a controlling and abusive father Crime watch daily He filmed the girls as they lay in bed Crime watch daily 5 The girls appear uncomfortable with being filmed 
Said, of Irving, Texas, filmed the just-awake girls and is heard to say: “Nice legs. Mmm very nice” as he pans over their legs.“Sarah sleeps with her pants? Mmm, very nice. Wow, look at those eyes. I got my eye on you,” he adds. 
Dallas News reported that the girls accused their father of sexual abuse in 1998, when they were 9 and 8 years old. Their mother, Patricia Owens, swore to cops that the allegations were true, but the girls told authorities that they lied because they did not want to move to a school in rural Texas. Related stories LIFE IMITATING ART TV producer who made film about murderous landlord stabs his own tenant for laughing at him HOUSE OF HORRORS Two-bed London flat where notorious Muswell Hill Murderer Dennis Nilsen lived is on sale for £500,000 'THEY'RE NOT FACTS' JonBenet Ramsey’s brother Burke back in court for lawsuit after expert claimed he 'killed sister' 'I'M GONNA LET MY DEMONS OUT TO PLAY' Chilling Facebook post of jealous stable hand who killed co-worker in stabbing frenzy as CCTV shows him calmly walking away from murder scene The rise of 'dark tourism' Thousands of people visiting the site of Fred and Rose West's house in creepy craze 
The material is from a documentary film called The Price of Honor and was featured on Crime Watch Daily . 
Amina’s secret boyfriend, Joseph Moreno, told the website: “She started telling me just little by little that it was more than him just being protective, it was more him being controlling and abusive”. 
“I wanted to get her away from that so bad, she was such a good person; she didn’t deserve to live like that.” FBI The FBI have offered $100,000 for information leading to his arrest 
The chilling video also features Amina holding her father’s gun. 
Sarah Said called 911 after being shot and – in between whimpers – is heard to say: “Oh my God, I’m dying”. 
is offering a reward of $100,000 for information leading to his arrest. 
Cops believe the Egyptian national was obsessed with and over-protective of his daughters and was tipped over the edge when he discovered one of them was in a relationship.
